node.excerpt: shows all possible logical relationships between one or more sets. The sets appear as simple shapes, usually circles or rectangles. Each area of overlap is labeled.  Unlike the Venn diagram, the Euler diagram shows not all but only relevantâ€¦

visualizationTechniquesYaml.name: grouping by boundary
visualizationTechniquesYaml.description: shows category membership (or the presence of a given relationship between two entities) by grouping visual components using a configurator component such as a demarcating line, enclosure or shared background.
